mapper.select: select * from request where r_writer=#{value} and r_active=1
select r_no from request where r_writer=#{value} and r_active=0

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM rnum, b.* FROM ( SELECT r.r_no, r.c_no, r.r_title, r.r_content, r.r_active, r.r_date, r.r_writer FROM request r, apply a WHERE r.r_active = 1 AND g_no=#{value} AND r.r_no = a.r_no ORDER BY r.r_no DESC ) b ) WHERE rnum BETWEEN ((#{page}-1) * 10 + 1) AND ((#{page}) * 10)

SELECT count(*) FROM ( SELECT b.* FROM ( SELECT r.r_no, r.c_no, r.r_title, r.r_content, r.r_active, r.r_date, r.r_writer FROM request r, apply a WHERE r.r_active = 1 AND g_no=#{value} AND r.r_no = a.r_no ORDER BY r.r_no DESC ) b )
SELECT count(*) FROM request WHERE c_no=#{c_no}

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM rnum, r.* FROM (
SELECT * FROM request a WHERE a.r_no not in (select r_no from apply where g_no = #{g_no}) and c_no=#{c_no} and a.r_active=1 ORDER BY a.r_no ) r ) WHERE rnum BETWEEN ((#{page}-1) * 10 + 1) AND ((#{page}) * 10)
select distinct r.r_no, r.c_no, r.r_title, to_char(r_date, 'yyyy.mm.dd hh24:mi') r_date from request r, apply a where r.r_no = a.r_no and r_writer=#{value} order by r_no
mapper.update: update request set r_active=0 where r_no=#{value}
mapper.select: select m.m_no, m.m_id, m.m_name, m.m_email, m.m_tel from ( select * from request r, (select * from apply) a where r.r_no = a.r_no and r.r_no = ${value} and r_active=1) b, member m where b.g_no = m.m_no
